Title: I’m a former CTO. Here is the 15 sec coding test I used to instantly filter out 50% of unqualified applicants. – Jose Zarazua
Description: If you have a remote position open, your challenge is not attracting the correct candidate, it’s filtering out the bad ones, because you’ll have hundreds or thousands of them.

Title: GitHub - electronicarts/ShaderToHuman: HLSL/GLSL library for debugging shaders
Description: HLSL/GLSL library for debugging shaders. Contribute to electronicarts/ShaderToHuman development by creating an account on GitHub.
